dialogues.text: Thank you, Tara.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't mention it. PAUL rushes to ZOIL who lies on the ground, wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The things I do for you, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I appreciate it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have any idea how difficult it was to catch you guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me take a look at that. Ruth, shine the torch down here? RUTH grabs a torch and steps in behind PAUL.
BLAM! RUTH lurches forward, suddenly limp. Everyone turns see MOSES BEHE, shotgun smoking in his and. His face whit his eyes wide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Lord, Ruth. My little Ruth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooooooooo! GRAHAM gathers RUTH up in his arms. She coughs, flecks of blood around her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I never meant to shoot her. I was aiming for the goblin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not a goblin he's from another planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he can't be. He... he...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's an alien you stupid man! Oh Ruth, Ruth I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I should have never persuaded you to come with us. RUTH focuses on GRAHAM. She smiles, weakly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, and miss all this? Graham, I've lived more in the last 48 hours that I ever did in that trailer park. Isn't that what you said living was all about? Right now? This conversation? That tree? My next cheeseburger? I'm not afraid anymore Graham. I'm cold though. Hey, where is everybody? RUTH shudders and dies. TARA and ZOIL look aghast. GRAHAM buries his head in RUTH's hair. CLIVE, his eyes are fille with tears, puts his and on GRAHAM's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have I done? I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. A shadow is cast across RUTH. Everyone looks up to see PA silhouetted against the moon. His eyes glint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no way this thing isn't gonna end happy.
PAUL drops to his knee and places his hands on RUTH's che MOSES drops his shotgun and lumbers over, distraught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away from her! Don't you touch my little girl. CLIVE holds out a hand to stop MOSES. He obeys. The air h charged with static. PAUL's skin ripples with color. Ever watches transfixed. RUTH's eye flickers and opens. With s difficulty, she sits up and takes off her glasses. She bl both shining, healthy eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruth, are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think so. Is anyone hungry? I really feel like a cheese burger. Relief and joy spreads through group. MOSES falls to his knees and sobs. He feels a hand on his shoulder and looks to see PAUL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. RUTH and GRAHAM hug. She smiles at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can kiss me now. They kiss with awkward passion. Everyone smiles then afte bit become uncomfortable and a bit grossed out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like the geek shall inherit the earth. CLICK CLICK. The group turn to see VOICE, upright, pointing his gun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't say- SPLAT. A large spaceship lands hard on top of VOICE. Everyone lo shocked. PAUL, GRAHAM and CLIVE exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happens to the best of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some time has passed, a number of PAUL style aliens are n present.

One of them uses a big hose to clean the remains of VOICE from the hull of the ship. Another two help the now heale soldier to their feet, patting them on the back and shaki their hands. The atmosphere is amiable. TEAM PAUL look at one another. ZOIL and MOSES have joined them. PAUL kisses and hugs RUTH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I frightened you so much your hair turned white.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't frighten me. You freed me. You helped me see the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take care of her big man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will sir. God be with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever dude. They high five. PAUL turns to ZOIL, whose arm is in a makeshift sling and shakes his hand.

dialogues.speaker: PAUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Lorenzo Zoil, you're a good man. Say bye to Karen for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safe trip Short Round. PAUL turns to GRAHAM and CLIVE. He pulls JELVA - ALIEN QU OF THE VARVAK from his pocket and hands it to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can keep it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool. Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Three tits, awesome. Although you know what? Sometimes, less is more. The boys nod.

dialogues.speaker: PAUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are, and always will be, our friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come here you fucking geeks. They hug. He takes in incandescent orb from his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: PAUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is a self-sustaining light orb. Might come in handy, you know, if a bulb goes. TARA is waiting for her goodbye but PAUL ignores her. He drops as he walks to his ship. He turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: PAUL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You coming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ruined your life Tara. Think I owe you a new one. TARA takes PAUL's hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have my toothbrush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby, where we're going, you won't need teeth. TARA frowns then follows PAUL aboard. PAUL and TARA stand the doorway. One of the other ALIENS comes out of a small room behind them, speaking in a strange tongue. Subtitle: THE BULB'S GONE IN THERE. As the door slowly closes, GRAHAM and CLIVE give PAUL the CE3K salute. PAUL gives them the finger. The boys laugh, tears in their eyes. The ship lifts off into the sky. GRA CLIVE, RUTH, MOSES and ZOIL watch them go. The light form ship gradually fades, leaving them in darkness. Pause.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was good, wasn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are at Comic-Con the following year. We come to rest o long line of people. Sat behind a table are GRAHAM and CL They look more confident, cooler. CLIVE is talking to a s woman in an EWOK costume. He pats her on the ass as she w away. All around them are stacks of their new novel: PAUL
A banner hangs behind, displaying the cover, GRAHAM's own rendering of their alien friend. They sign copies. The PUBLICIST mills around, looking very pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just one item per person please. He winks at the boys. RUTH rushes up to GRAHAM, she is dressed as Storm from X-Men and pushes a customized buggy which sits a baby dressed as Professor X.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey babe. You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just taking Tara over to the autograph pavilion. Michael Biehn's here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, say hi from us, won't you? RUTH kisses GRAHAM. Two nerds approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... were you... did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you go.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY MAN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Next in line please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... were you... did you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There you go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, if you've had your book signed please move on. Tilt up to reveal the security man. It is none other than former Special Agent LORENZO ZOIL. CRANE up to reveal the whole convention floor.
